channel.title: Software on Aiden Arnkels-Webb
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Aiden Arnkels-Webb

item.title: Standard list of software I install on my mums computer and phone
item.description: You know the drill, as the kid with the tech skills you get roped into helping your parents and other family members with their busted tech. I notice that every time I ressurect or reincarnate the treasured device of a family member I end up installing much of the same software. I wrote this to save me some time, and to help others who are in the same boat. My preferred recommendation in each category is in bold.
